title: ESLint Target
description: Lint target options for Build Facade.

cacheLocation.description: Name of the file or directory where the cache will be stored.

configFile.description: The configuration file to use. If useEslintrc is true or not specified, this configuration will be merged with any configuration defined in .eslintrc.* files, with options in this configuration having precedence.

fix.description: Fixes linting errors (may overwrite linted files).

force.description: Succeeds even if there was linting errors.

reportUnusedDisableDirectives.description: When set to true, adds reported errors for unused eslint-disable directives when no problems would be reported in the disabled area anyway.

useEslintrc.description: Set to false to disable use of .eslintrc files.
